properties.entry: UPDATE MEMBER SET PROFILE_IMG = ? , NICKNAME = ? , MEMBER_PWD = ? , EMAIL = ? , PHONE = ? WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , PHONE , EMAIL , NICKNAME , STATUS , ENROLL_DATE , PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ?
UPDATE MEMBER SET STATUS ='S' WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ?
SELECT MEMBER_NO , MEMBER_NAME , MEMBER_ID , MEMBER_PWD , PHONE , EMAIL , NICKNAME , STATUS , ENROLL_DATE , PROFILE_IMG FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = ? AND MEMBER_PWD = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
